name: Surviving Mars: Season Pass
detailed_description:
Save money on content for this game by purchasing the Season Pass. Content can be downloaded from Steam when available.

Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder all about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a space agency for resources and financial support before determining a location for your colony. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to unlock more elaborate ways to shape and expand your settlement. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a hard day’s work. Most important of all, though, is keeping your colonists alive. Not an easy task on a strange new planet.

The Season Pass will add two full expansions and two content packs to Surviving Mars in the months following launch.

Save with the Season Pass and never miss a single addition -- each one is yours to download as soon as it arrives.

short_description: The Season Pass will add two full expansions and two content packs to Surviving Mars in the months following launch.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD 4600/Geforce 620/Radeon 6450 or equivalent GPUs with 1 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: 5th Generation Intel i5 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 750 Ti or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 (GeForce 600/AMD Radeon 5000 or higher) with 1GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: Fast quad-core CPUs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970-level GPU with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 (GeForce 600/AMD Radeon 7700 or higher) with 1GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Fast quad-core CPUs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970-level GPU with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
